sparker-arm commented on issue #4021:

Ah, the joys of non-native development... Looks like I need to fix the loads for the signed operations.

cfallin commented on issue #4021:

I just rebased this PR over the recent RA2 merge to fix up the conflicts. Sorry about the noise and happy to review this once the signed bits are fixed!

sparker-arm commented on issue #4021:

Sorry, I made a mess of my rebase and so now I've squashed everything back into one commit.
